productDescription:
Designed with enough room to hold one camera body with up to two lenses and a flash, as well as an assortment of film or memory cards, batteries, and other necessities for photographers. This case is a great bag for the traveling photographer. Practical and attractive, it is a great way to protect your equipment from moisture and dust as well as the wear and tear that results from excessive handling.
Extreme Speed to Catch Every Frame For super-fast continuous burst mode shots, maximum post-production workflow efficiency, and high-performance video recording, get SanDisk Extreme PRO SDHC and SDXC UHS-II cards. The high-performance SDHC and SDXC memory cards boast shot speeds up to 260MB/s (1733X) and transfer speeds up to 300MB/s (2000X). UHS Speed Class 3 (U3) supports 32GB to 128GB of Full HD and cinema-quality 4K video recording. Optimized for cameras that support the new UHS-II standard, SanDisk Extreme PRO SDHC and SDXC UHS-II cards deliver the uncompromising results that professional photographers demand.

reviews.reviewText:
This package is probably the BEST option of anyone wanting to seriously take photos. I am from the old school of photography that existed way before digital invaded SLRs. That being said, I've adapted. (lol). This camera does a great job of offering up great 'advice' in the provided automated settings. It's accurate for lighting in most situations. If you learn to use the light meter settings properly to account for difficult lighting situations (ie, beach & snow & highly dappled situations), you will be able to use this camera and get very professional grade photos. That is, if you can see well enough to focus. (or, you can rely on autofocus- but you need to make sure you use the focal function setting that will only focus on the main target). My biggest gripe with all these new cameras and lenses is that they no longer provide a split screen for focusing manually. My eyesight is not as good as when I was young and I need glasses. I can't count on my eyesight for perfect focus anymore. That split screen was my insurance. Now, you need to either have very accurate glasses or you need to trust the autofocus. Personally, I hate losing that control over my photos. If you are extremely picky about how you like to compose your photos, use your aperture for focal effects, etc, these new digital cameras don't generally include the split screen focal ability. Ok. Enough of my singular gripe. Other than that, this camera offers several 'stupid proof' settings for various lighting scenarios- ie, portrait, sport, etc. If you select one for the described condition, the camera does a very nice job of selecting the right aperture and speed settings. This camera is also designed for video. I haven't tested how well the video works yet, but Canon is a leader in all areas- they have been upgrading their video capabilities for some time now. My daughter's rebel (one version older) has great video function so I will assume this one does as well. I will update if it's not true.

I LOVE that this camera comes with a pop up flash AND an additional flash which can be used in so many different ways. it allows extra light in super dark conditions or two directions of light which can be synched with a cable.

I also LOVE the two different stands that come with this package. The tall stand is a little CHEAP, but if you are just getting started, it will do. Just don't abuse it and it should last a couple years, I would think. Don't lose any screws or parts that fall off- put them back on the stand to ensure you don't lose them. Repair at home or on the spot. It's pretty basic. The little stand is very efficient and handy for times when hauling a big one is not reasonable (for example, if you are a climber, hiker, biker, etc. ).

I also LOVE the two lenses that come with the camera. The basic lense is a standard close to mid range zoom. It will cover almost all your basic photography needs. Even from quite a distance. But if you are wishing to take super long distant shots (like the moon, far off vulcanos popping over the cloud tops, animals at Yellowstone, etc,) the longer zoom is your perfect option. What's great about the two lenses is that they have the same size opening. That means you can use filters, attaching lenses and other lense accessories for both of them- in other words, you don't need to buy two sets of all these things, which can be very expensive and heavy to carry around.

This camera also has two additional screw on 'helper lenses'. These are not true lenses in that they don't attach to your camera directly. They attach to the lenses. One is a wide angle lense (will allow you to see more to the sides of your normal view) and the other is a telephoto lense (that doubles the magnification of what you normally see through the lense.) As mentioned before, these fit both lenses.

HAPPY it comes with the filters. While these are not clearly explained in the product description, these are neutral density filters that basically protect your lense glass. You will want to put one on each lense. CLEAN your lense and the filters with the PROVIDED KIT only. Blow all dust off both the lense and filter and only then put the filter on. make sure all moisture is dried up first. This will protect your lense. Believe me, you WILL scratch your lense. Better to scratch a cheap filter than your real lense.

THRILLED about getting TWO batteries so that you can juice both up and go out on a long hike or camping trip without running out of battery. So, so important.

LOVE that this Cannon set includes THREE ways to transfer your photo files: you can plug the memory chip into a device directly if your device accepts its size. You can use the digital stick with a standard USB plug that will fit into any computer. You can use the WI-FI option of the camera to directly upload to the internet or any device with Bluetooth capabilities. Now THAT's flexibility!

Last, but not least, is the FUN and sometimes necessary REMOTE CONTROL. This assortment of extra features included in this kit could, alone, cost many hundreds if bought together. I find it remarkable to get all of them together, with a bag and shoulder strap for under $500. The camera and lenses alone could cost that amount in a camera shop.

Well, I hope this was useful for you. If so, give me a thumbs up. I review quite a few products and films but I get a little frustrated when it seems they aren't helpful to people. Let me know if you find this helpful, ok? If so, I will keep giving these types of reviews.

I did so much research before purchasing this camera and am glad I did. I wanted a DSLR camera that not only took GREAT photos for Instagram but videos for YouTube. I also wanted it to be easy to transfer my media to my computer or phone for editing and posting. This camera is great so far...One thing I didn't even think about was the weight of the camera with lens. This camera is super light and easy to carry with me and on top of that takes amazing photos! The accessories that came in the kit from Ritz Camera were great and just the icing on the top. I do like that the camera bag and strap are actually Canon brand but I will be purchasing a bigger bag to carry all of my supplies. I haven't had a chance to play with the video at this point but a couple of tips with the photos:
#1 Make sure you put your camera strap on right away. It is a life saver if you trip (not that I every do that) or want easy access.
#2 Change the auto off setting. The standard setting is 30 seconds and I found that to be way too short when staging a photo.
#3 (This may be a no brainer for all of you but honestly it stumped me at first) To use the additional lenses, you just twist them on to the base Canon lens.

So my overall rating is 5 out of 5 at this point!

This is just a preliminary posting as I haven't tried out all of the bells and whistles yet but am super please with Ritz Camera and the kit that they put together.

I would recommend this as a starter kit for any amateur photographer or hobbiest out there.
My only recommendation for purchaser's would be to buy a few extra camera batteries.
The 18 mega pixels​ this has gives beautiful images that are easy to work with when cropping and enlarging during photo editing.
I've added a couple of photos to show you what this can do right out of the box.

As much research as I did, you CANNOT beat this deal!! It felt like a huge risk buying it from amazon and I noticed some reviews said some things were missing, I was so worried about spending so much money and something go wrong... but I am SO GLAD I took that risk!!!! It was perfect! Everything was there. I even had the canon bag ( I’m assuming it’s because I chose the premium bundle!) but the bag really only fits, ( the camera, and the lenses and a couple small items) so I will be buying a bigger bag anyways so none of that made a difference to me. Seriously, the camera was in perfect condition, everything. I registered the camera with canon too! The gear that comes with it really is great, I mean some of it you can tell is cheap but does it work? YES! It all works. I think everything works fine except the flash drive, the metal piece for the USB port came off, but I wasn’t going to use a flash drive anyways. But ritz camera has contacted me wanting to know how everything was and I’m sure they would love to help you with any problems you may have! This is seriously the best deal and I’m so happy with everything!

reviews.reviewTitle: I wish I could give this product a ten!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't think that I would love something so much! It came in an enormous box and everyone was so confused on what it was and as we started opening it, it was my kit! I was going to take a picture of everything inside but I was way too excited. The camera is amazing quality and I love the whole kit. I think I would've been fine without all four lenses since I'm a beginner photographer but I'll find a way to use it. I like how simplistic the camera is and the automated settings, it's easy to use and figure out. I did wish that the camera came with a warranty because I didn't really want to pay an extra $40, but it was alright. The 75-300mm lens is heavy with the camera and I wasn't expecting it, but you do get used it as I did. Overall a great camera and I can't wait to take it with me to Europe!

This was a gift for my son, a beginner photography student. The only camera he has ever used was the one on his smartphone. He LOVES this camera. It has a great package for anyone new to photography. He is still learning, but he is learning fast. A lot of reviews mentioned the low quality of the accessories, are they the highest quality? Maybe not, we honestly wouldnt know, but everything in his kit has worked.
Now, the spare battery was missing from our shipment. I contacted amazon, then sent a message to the seller. These guys immediately sent out the spare battery. We got it within a couple of days. The communication was fantastic and they were very prompt with their response.
For this price you get everything you need to start taking pictures in a variety of settings. Yes the tripod is short, and? It works. My son even put that thing in a tree. (I almost had a heart attack seeing his new camera perched up there) I got him a taller tripod that extends for $5, he carries both and uses both.
The case that came with it will fit the whole kit in it.
The card reader and SD cards all worked. We plugged the card reader into my laptop and it read with no problems.
He hasnt used the filters much yet, but they were of course tried out . He said they work. Now we just need to pick up a remote and this kid is set.
We're new to photography, but we are very happy with this camera and everything that came with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... not the 32GB other than that the camera is great loved it
reviews.reviewText: This didn't come with everything it says it does I only got one tripod the 8" not the bigger one and one SD card the 16gb not the 32GB other than that the camera is great loved it!! Just not true on two things.

I got this to replace - or supplement - my old Canon Rebel that I've had for about 10 years or so. I don't really have a laptop of my own anymore so the wifi feature is a dream. It was easy to get connected to my phone and ipad and get my pictures using the Canon Camera Connect app. The bundle seems fine - mine had all the items listed. I already had the lenses plus a few others but it never hurts to have some extras. The bag is really nice as well though I already have a bag (backpack style). I'll be using this one a lot more since it's so easy to get the pictures directly to my chosen devices. It does take really nice pictures also (just like my older model does).

First of all: Everything works, no damaged items, no used/refurbished items ''smuggled'' in. :-)
Cons first: The little tripod is not really usable without remote, too shaky and unstable. Flash light, well... pretty cheap one. Same goes for the cleaning set. Why there's a 3 way level when the tripod has levels is beyond me. Maybe I should pay more attention to keeping my camera level. :-) The packaging itself looked a little bit like they used all the leftover packaging material and threw the items in a box to get out of the door on time and watch the game. A little more love packing stuff wouldn't hurt.
Pros: Pretty good (big) tripod with bubble levels works just fine. The four(!) lenses are good (Canon and Polaroid) and not cheap no-name finds from China. The memory cards are fast ones, 16 + 32 gb is a lot when starting out. The filters are good as well and playing around is a lot of fun. The bag is a decent size, camera and the two big lenses fit without a problem, the quality of the bag is ok (Not a canon bag!). You can move the dividers around and make them fit just right.
Last but not least the camera itself: No need to get a book in order to snap good pictures, a lot of thinking is done by the camera and the preset scenes. Works like a charm. Changing the presets takes some time to figure out, but that's just my ''I don't/want need a manual'' approach. After a day on the couch putting all the pieces together and taking them apart again, I must say the camera works better than I expected. I was torn between T6 and T6i, good thing I went with the T6. This camera can do everything a non-professional photographer will ever need, even movies. The set is pretty much perfect, with a few exceptions. I would have liked a remote in the set, but that's not a deal breaker at all.
I am very happy with the camera and the set and would recommend to a friend. With Ritz Camera I think I found a good and reliable supplier for further purchases.

When I got the (enormous) box, I was on my way to a cabin. When I got to said cabin, opening this box was like Christmas morning. Every time I stuck my hand in there, there was some other accessory. I knew I was getting a bunch of stuff when I ordered it, but seeing it all spread out on the table was absolutely insane.

Great, great value and great, great pictures. Well worth every penny!

Here is the email i wrote to Canon about this camera:

I recently purchased a Canon Rebel T6 1300D DSLR camera. I intended to use this camera ostensibly for shooting videos of sunsets, babbling brooks and beach scenery. I use these videos to calm my nerves and have been looking for a good quality camera capable of shooting 1080p video without too much hassle. Canon is a good reputable brand, and so i purchased this camera.

The descriptions i read about this camera all said that it was capable of filming 1080p video. What they failed to mention is that the camera can only film 1080p video for 11 minutes before it shuts itself off & you have to start it up again. It does this because of the 4gb filesize limit of the storage media.

Other manufacturers get around this by coding the firmware to record the video in 4gb segments which are later stitched together. For some reason your cameras are not capable of doing this.

Well actually they ARE perfectly capable of doing this, but only after installing some 3rd party firmware called Magic Lantern, which is a procedure which would of course void the warranty. Since i had just paid nearly $500 for this camera, i was not willing to do that. So instead i have returned the camera & will purchase another camera from one of your competitors. I'm currently leaning towards a Panasonic.

I wanted to write you and let you know about this. It seems sad, pathetic even, that open-source hobbyists are capable of writing better firmware for your cameras than you yourselves are. Even sadder is that you cant even be bothered to go look at their code (which is open source, available to all) and implement these very useful features into your product line. The only explanation i can think of for this lunacy is that your R&D department must be extremely lazy, either that or for some reason you want your products to have these severe design flaws.

Anyway, in the short term it has cost you a sale... in the long term i'll never again see anything from canon as being a quality product.

If it was my company i would want to know about this so I could take steps to fix it.

--Thank you

reviews.reviewTitle: Watch the child-like desire for more....
reviews.reviewText:
Camera, memory card and table/flexible tri-pod are about all that is good about this package. The camera is of course AMAZING. The external flash is cheap, filters can be applied even in a smart phone, tri-pod is too short - even for a 5ft 1in frame, and the extra lenses are mediocre at best. The included case is not large enough for the basics in this package.

Since I received this, I purchased a larger case, a larger tri-pod, a better flash, a couple of hoods and a flash diffuser.... Now I have a complete package!

If it wasn't for the camera, I would rate this one star. Advice to anyone looking??? Buy the camera and memory card, the rest you can put together for cheaper and with better products.

Overall, very happy with the purchase. My wife has some problems with hand tremors, and it helps to have a viewfinder instead of just the LCD screen so that she can hold it closer to the body and brace. Plus having the auto stabilization on the main lens helps. An SLR is a bit overkill here, but very few cameras now have that viewfinder unless you are up the price scale a ways, so decided to go this route after reading reviews. And frankly, too small and light is actually not as stable for her, anyway.
Autofocus is fast and accurate, although a little care needs to be made to center the subject for the focus. Found a few where the main subject was out of center, and one of the focus points caught something else. With the camera in full program mode, it has still taken a number of excellent pictures just during testing, balancing focus and exposure well with depth of field.
Had purchased my last SLR (Minolta X700) from Ritz storefront about 25 years ago, and was just as happy with customer service this time. Like some others have posted, ours actually had only a 16GB card instead of the second 32GB, and only one battery instead of two. After sending Ritz an email, they shipped out the additional items the next day, and I received those within a week.
Have not had time to verify that everything functions correctly, yet - my wife left with the camera and basic lens and the table tripod for a vacation a couple of days after we got it. We'll see how she did when she returns, and I'll test the remainder then.
The only downside which I see at all is that the case is a bit small for all of the components. That's really about it - as far as a kit goes, pretty inclusive. And a well rated camera for someone not needing too many professional-level functions. So far, I recommend it.
Edit - for those who did not receive the extra battery and the larger memory card - I contacted Ritz through Amazon and received a reply the next day. I hope that this helps you - they literally sent the additional parts immediately with no questions. I think that they realize that there is some mix up between the 4-lens kit and the 4-lens PREMIUM kit, which were the same price when I purchased.

reviews.reviewTitle: Check your bundle package very carefully
reviews.reviewText: I’m just getting into photography as a hobby and I picked this camera and bundle based on other reviews and research. So far I really like the camera but really need to play around with it more. It’s easy to use and I like the image quality. My camera and bundle package arrived on time but my only issue is that the lens filters were not included as shown in the picture on amazon.

I hate this camera. It takes great pictures but as a dual use camera for stills and video it is absolutely HORRIBLE. I purchased this camera for both options to use on my you tube channel. For still pictures it is very good. It is terrible for videos.

There is a time limit for the video option. My particular camera will only record 12 continuous minutes of video. Some other people can only record video to 4g which is about 5 minutes. 12 minutes of video is ridiculous. I use my video equipment to make....take a guess...videos.

This camera is advertised as both a still and video camera. Absolutely NO MENTION of the limited video capability of this camera. I find that this omission is done purposely to mislead the buyer.

If you want to just take stills then the camera is in the ok category.

If you Vlog, shoot you tube videos or other videos for personal or public use then this camera is an ABSOLUTE WASTE OF MONEY.

Why don't I return it......I threw out all of the packaging. My bad.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera with all the right accessories
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a birthday present for my grown daughter. She has wanted to get into more serious photography for several years. She loves the camera and the kit. The T6 is an amazing camera and has opened a whole new world for her. The wifi capability is great and all the lenses that came with the kit have allowed her to accomplish shots she could only think about previously. Canon and Ritz seemed to have really gotten it right with this bundle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Unboxing Video and Tips for this Kit
reviews.reviewText: Here is a video of me unboxing this kit. I also bought some things including the 1st lens, lens cleaner, and the USB splitter(In the video) Other then that, everything inside the box if whats included in this bundle. I think its a great deal. I also suggest buying a different lens cleaner kit because the one included is way too small, and doesn't have everything you need. The small tri-pod is a 8 inches and the 50" is made of plastic but is still good for holding your camera in place. You only get 1 battery so make sure you buy a spare. you get about 3 days standby, and 7 hours while its on. so very good battery, might be more or less depending. The flash requires AA batteries, so make sure you get some if you plan on buying this kit. You might also want to set your settings on your camera to save images as "RAW" files, so they look the best when you export them.

First off, this is going to be a review of the accessories in this kit, not the camera itself. There are plenty of reviews out there on the T6 by people a lot more qualified than I am. I purchased the "Premium 4-Lens Bundle" for my 100 level Intro to Photography class.
I have really enjoyed this kit but there are some drawbacks. Everything out of the Canon box is top notch, I really like that it comes with both lens and a nice bag. Something I noticed was there isn't enough room to keep the 75-300mm lens on the camera in the Canon bag. The Ritz Gear lenses are nice, but you'll probably have to clean up the treads to remove plastic from the lens caps. The 12-inch tripod is really sturdy in the legs, but the head will not support the camera; I threw it in with my GoPro accessories. The screen protector is a cut to fit style so I didn't mess with trying to install it. I will probably order a model specific protector here soon. I found the shutter button very helpful when I was trying to take long exposure photos on an overpass and didn't have time to mess with connecting my phone to the camera. It feels solid, but it's not an overly sturdy unit. The Card Reader is about as basic as it gets, I haven't tried it with an SD card, but I couldn't get my Micro SD card to read; it may have been user error due to poor markings. The Slave flash is nice and bright, however, it's pretty lightweight and the clamshell does not feel sturdy. The SD Card and extra battery are really nice to have and come in handy a lot(note the extra battery is not a Canon battery. As for the tripod, throw it out or use it for lighting. The legs are thin aluminum and everything else is poorly molded plastic. Right out of the bag the tripod had nuts and bolts falling off and plastic left on it from the molding process. The head is poorly fitted plastic and there is a lot of play in the quick detach. I would be hesitant about mounting my GoPro to it on a windy day.
Overall this has been a great starter kit for me, just be prepared to slowly upgrade this accessory bundle.

I received this and it is not what I expected. The tripod that comes with this bundle is not very durable. If I'm not careful with it I could easily break it. Fortunately my wife and I bought a high quality tripod just prior to this purchase. I'm a little reluctant in using the supplied tripod. Now as far as the bundle not to bad at all for the money I spent. I bought a different bundle (both canon T6 cameras)for my wife for her birthday and she received a lot more. This is why I choose the smaller bundle so I can use her additional accessories.

The camera is great for its price. However the bag I received was ripped when I opened it. The tripod is what you would expect for a small portable one, the sd cards came as advertised. The package deal is excellent except for the bag quality not being very good at all. If the bag at least lasted a week I’d give this 5 stars however it sadly didn’t tho.

I had a canon rebel SLR years ago, it was not digital, but I loved it. I have wanted a DSLR for years and finally broke down and bought one. Out of the box, this camera takes great shots. I used the Sport auto selection and was able to take some great hummingbird shots. I still have a lot to learn about the product. It was packaged very well and had almost everything I need. I wish the package would have come with a few extra filters and possibly a higher end flash. But I am extremely happy.

WARNING: THIS CAMERA ONLY RECORDS 11 MINUTE MOVIES AT A TIME, UNLIKE ALL OTHER CAMERAS, EVEN CANON

After two weeks of use, the camera stopped communicating through the mini usb port, shutting off the power as soon as the computer sees the camera: subsequently, the Wi-Fi connection became intermittent. Also, the extra double capacity "poweradd brand" battery provides 1/4 life of the cabin battery.

both the battery and camera failing indicates handling and long shelf-time and/or excessive temperatures/vibratiion

Ultimately, regardless of the defective camera and battery, I learned after page 200 that movie file size is limited to 4 GB - 11 minutes, and 26 seconds:
BOTH CANON and Ritz Camera failed to disclose this unacceptable limitation, and the product should be pulled off the market.

Everything in this kit is a piece of junk other than the Canon stuff. I didn't believe that things could be made so cheaply, I tried pretty much everything and was amazed at how bad it was even the first time. I have no doubt that the rest of components will break just like the flexible tripod did in the first 2 days. What really put me over the edge was the extra battery in the kit. It claims to be double the capacity of the stock canon battery, but was dead 48 hours after charging with no use. This wouldn't be an issue other than I left the real battery on charge at home when I went to my brother's wrestling match. Just junk...

First off, This camera Canon EOS T6 will not work as a webcam for youtube or twitch. It does not have a clean output and your screen on camera will have the rectangle focus icon in the overlay/ +cropping is needed. BUT as a starter camera or someone looking for a good quality performance camera...the camera +++++

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for beginning photo, not great for video; lots of fluff you dont need
reviews.reviewText:
Everybody needs to get a start somewhere, and like many entering videography, I was trying to hit the ground running. There are a ton of supplies that you need, besides a camera, that videographers have to keep in mind when buying a set - an extra battery, tripod, filters, extra sandisk, etc. This pack meets a lot of those requirements for photo, but not for video. Here is why.
The TRIPOD is excellent for grabbing studio photos, is a great height, very stable, and very light. For video however, its far too cheap, sticky, and clunky for any kind of panning or product shots - when adjusting, it skips and jumps instead of moving smoothly.
The camera KIT LENS, the 18-55mm, is fantastic for photography - really gets you a pleasant range of shot styles from 35mm-50mm portraits, to nice wide shots at the 18mm for selfie style videos and the like. Photos come out clean and with minimal distortion (to an amateur photographers eye). For video however, the lenses are not very functional. The zooming and focus ring (even during manual focus) are very audible in video, making it impossible to use unless youre using external audio. Also, the minimum aperture (f/4.5) is simply not enough for indoor or nighttime shooting, even at its widest, shots come out blurry, soft, and slightly noisy.
The CAMERA itself, while fabulous for photography, cannot stand the rigors of videography. The sensor manages to grab beautiful photos, but the videos - even in broad daylight - comes out soft and slightly low quality. And during low light, the camera is simply unable to capture any usable video at all - a modern iphone could probably do better. (Of course, this is with the kit lens - a 50mm prime f/1.8 should do much better in low light, but thats an additional $50-$125.)
The 75-300 ZOOM LENS is barely usable also - at the far end of the zoom, the distortion makes even the photos look fuzzy. The aperture limit makes it usable only for daylight and high light environments, such as maybe sport photography, but the lens distortion is too strong at deeper focus - youd be better off just not spending the extra $64 on it.
The included WIDE ANGLE LENS attachment is kitchy and lovable, but of course comes with heavy distortion, and can only be used for more artistic and less creatively restrictive photos. The TELEPHOTO LENS attachment is clunky and almost never necessary. In the time you take to put it on, you could just move closer to your subject, because the amount of zoom it gives you is negligible compared to the distortion it puts on the image.
The included FLASH is very small, and has a very short affectable distance (5-7ft @night). It is not usable for street photography, except at night, and not at sunset. However, it is highly portable, and can be super useful in a pinch.
The other auxiliary equipment the kit comes with is super useful - lens cleaners, usb chip readers, etc, but those things arent as expensive as you think they are and arent necessary to buy up front. After buying this kit, the only things that I actually use (being an amateur videographer and photographer) are the camera with kit lens, tripod, spare batteries, strap, sd chip, and included flash, all of which could be bought at a higher quality, separately, for a similar price.
Honestly, If you are starting out just shooting photo, save the money and just buy this camera with the kit lens, a nice big san disk, a flash, and a tripod, and then once you feel comfortable, grab some cheap prime lenses with more low light power. You'll end up with less crap you wont use.

Wouldn't power on at first, which scared the crap out of me. But after adjusting the battery extender I had purchased separately, she fired right up... since then, I have been in love with this kit. It really came with just about everything I knew a novice would need, and even some touches I would have overlooked. A great buy!

UPDATE: After using the camera for about a month, I have chosen to drop it down a notch on my star rating. Partly in fact that the camera has no microphone port and therefore only picks up sound from its internal mic, which sadly, is as good as listening to someone speak through a tunnel. Wonderful camera for a novice and would recommend to any family for its excellent imagery and affordability.

There are items missing from my order: 57” Tripod and carrying case, the high capacity LPE10 replacement battery, and the lens cap strap. And this is false advertising all poloroid brand items when they actually send you all generic versions of the accessories; which I wouldn’t even mind if they would have just sent me everything I paid for. I called Amazon about this and all they said was for me to repackage everything and send it back for a refund. I’m extremely stressed and disappointed.

Having had this item for less than a week, it's hard to rate durability at this point. The few pictures I've taken have shown good quality. The shipping information was on point and received the day it was promised. I am impressed with the auto flash which lights at quite a distance. I have not used it in a variety of situations, so the versatility rating is limited, but under the different conditions I've tried the camera have not disappointed. I have an older DSLR that is so heavy; this is much lighter. My old camera has a lens that combines the lengths of the two lenses included with this camera, so I may find it a little more cumbersome to switch lenses with the circumstances. While I wasn't in need of most of the accessories, this kit was a little less expensive than buying the camera/2 lenses with bag plus an SD card and extra battery, so the rest of the stuff was just gravy as I have cleaning supplies, tripods, etc.

reviews.reviewTitle: After opening the package and realizing that some of the ...
reviews.reviewText:
After opening the package and realizing that some of the products they advertised incorrect. They show the 0.43 High Definition AF Wide Angle Lens, 58mm, the 2.2 High Definition AF Telephoto Lens 58mm and the Tripod as Polaroid products instead I received there brand ( Ritz Gear ) absolutely not right. Along with that they also show two batteries, I received one.
If your going to advertise a certain product and don't isn't that false advertisement.
The reason I'm giving it two stars is the camera itself at least that was the camera showed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera. Basic beginners kit. I am very happy with all.
reviews.reviewText:
Hello.
I am very happy with this kit. It came with all the item's it says.
The camera is just great. In a few minutes I got great pictures and with the Wi-Fi connection i had the photos on my cellphone very quickly. You most read the user's manual before start otherwise watch some videos on YouTube to learn how to use it for the first time. I think is great for beginners.
The two lens are ok. They are not Canon but if you are learning they are ok. Before use them read the user's manual.
The Polaroid tripod is a portable tripod. Light and it came with a bag. You can go everywhere with it. Just be careful with the wind if you are going to take landscapes pictures.
The other tripod is strong and articulated. Just be careful and be sure how to use it.
The shoulder bag is big, and it brings the protection your camera needs.
I did not use the other items yet. The package just arrive a few days ago because we are far away from USA. But the unboxing was like to open the Christmas gifts.
If you are going to get this kit and is your firts dsrl camera, please read the user's manual and enjoy.

So I ordered this bundle Wednesday night and I received the package Saturday morning and it felt like christmas morning. I received more than what I expected and I will post the pic of what came with the bundle. This is by far the best camera I ever had,i had few digital cameras in the past,last year i got a nikon coolpix,it was good but I was looking for something more,something good that I can use for our out of the country vacation in December,this is a good upgrade and Im so glad I bought this. I will post pictures as well. Im still trying to learn the different functions of the camera and I will enroll myself to a photography class, because I ordered the premium bundle,i think its the reason why i got the branded stuff. RITZ camera is a good company and i will definitely recommend them. Lastly,the best part of this camera is the fact that you're able to xfer the pictures right away to your phone or social media account.

reviews.reviewTitle: The bundle came in incomplete, with no "Spare Lithium ...
reviews.reviewText: The bundle came in incomplete, with no "Spare Lithium Ion Replacement Battery" per the description of the item. Also All the components of the bundle, (expect the Cannon lenses and the bag since they came all in a Cannon Box) were Ritz Camera generic brand and not Polaroid as the description and pictures clearly show.

Well just like other reviews I am frustrated that all of the accessories listed in the product description we're not included in my package. I found the camera and two lenses for a better price after I purchased this package. But I tried to justify the price because of the accessories. Without the accessories this was not the best value. If I am just reviewing the camera, it is a great product and the lenses are genuine Canon lenses. I would just advise to purchase with another vendor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really true to it’s word. Amazing quality.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this camera! It came with so many extras! My mom got a lesser version of this and spend well over $800. It truly is an amazing camera in and of itself. It came with everything described and top quality. I’m totally just a normal person wanting good pics of my daughter, this exceeded my expectations. Now I’m finding myself standing in freezing snow just to look at how amazing my pictures look. 10/10 wholeheartedly.

reviews.reviewTitle: The camera is amazing and I love all that came with this kit
reviews.reviewText: The camera is amazing and I love all that came with this kit. My only problem is the Polaroid flash that came with this kit the bulb popped and broke only after us useing the TEST feature on the flash after we unbound it. Other than that everything is wonderfull.

reviews.reviewTitle: Will not be buying the “kit” again...
reviews.reviewText:
UPDATE 8/21: The kit lenses broke(18-55 i think)! the auto focus does not work, i have to manually focus the camera which is pretty upsetting when i need to take fast pictures. cheap quality, very upset.

The camera and lenses themselves are great , good quality easy to use. But for the kit like the filters , tripods, release click, and “cleaner kit” are horrible. The cleaner kit is ridiculous, “cleaner fluid” isn’t even fluid , just comes with an empty bottle i could buy for 50 cents at walmart. for the tripods, they look absolutely nothing like the pictures and smell of really bad chemicals, and even have scratches on them like they’ve been used before. The slave flash isn’t even the brand in
the picture. Overall Canon, you guys did a bad job with the kits. I’d stick with just the camera. Very disappointed. Gave two stars for the camera and lenses but the rest is bad

I absolutely love this bundle. I have only been using it a short time and have managed to take more than 1500 pictures. I'm still learning a lot about manual mode but I love my camera and all the items that came with this kit. Everything was packaged well and everything works wonderfully.
I have recommended this to several of my friends and family.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... it several times since purchasing this item and I love it. I'm just learning to be a photographer
reviews.reviewText: I've used it several times since purchasing this item and I love it. I'm just learning to be a photographer, but this is a great start. I've shared several different photos I've taken with this camera.

My bundle came without any batteries for the camera. I chose this bundle over others because it came with an extra battery, but to my surprise, neither the original nor the supposed "replacement lithium battery" came with it.
So, I still havent been able to try my camera.
Also, the cap strap did't came, and the "5 piece cleaning kit" was an empty spay plastic bottle and nothing more.

Great first camera for my daughter. She's already snapping away. The package deal made it an affordable gift that she will get many many years out of. Easy to use and all the different add on's it came with were awesome.

The Value Added items - extra lenses, lens cleaner, and even the memory card, are complete rubbish.
The telephoto lens arrived on pieces, the wide angle lens is misaligned and gives blurred images, the memory card is only has 2gb usable storage and the cleaning fluid was empty.

At first, reading the reviews it was a mix of pros and cons! I order this camera for daily pictures and to help capture family events. I've took a few so far and I'm very pleased with the result. I'm no professional but photography is a hobby of mine. There is alot that comes with this package. It nicely pacaged in individual bags and boxes. This package also came with a huge instructions book. The order took no time! Overall I would order again.
Love this set! Everything came in just as described. I would definitely recommend it, especially for the price. The camera itself is great, perfect for beginners!

reviews.reviewTitle: but the camera itself is sturdy and solid and so are the lenses
reviews.reviewText: WOW! I have to say I was impressed with the package! I ordered it yesterday and through prime got it last night! It came in a huge box, very well packaged. It came with more than pictured. I have not used the camera yet as the battery needed to charge, but the camera itself is sturdy and solid and so are the lenses. The instruction manual seems very straight forward. There is a lot this camera can do. It might take me some time to figure it all out, but I am looking forward to it. I will update my review once I use the camera. For now, this seems like a steal!

Because photography isn't my job or hobby I was looking for a good camera for dummy. I think this is the perfect beginners camera for anyone that loves photography.
And when I ordered this set I didn't think that I would love something so much! The bundle seems fine - mine had all the items listed and top quality. High quality camera bundle with very good lenses. I'm not sure that I can take great images but camera try to do it instead me!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing camera, great kit, fast shipping
reviews.reviewText: I'm an aspiring photographer. I had to buy a dslr before I could start my photography classes. This kit seemed to have so much to offer for such a good price. Boy am I glad I bought it. There was so much that came with the camera. So far it works amazingly. I just don't know how to use it haha. It came in fast and came with everything it said it would. Only thing I noticed was I didn't get two batteries like the picture, not sure if I was supposed to, but that was all. If it isn't as good as I thought I'll come back with an update!

reviews.reviewTitle: The quality is just terrible. Let's start with the lenses - they are ...
reviews.reviewText:
If you are looking to buy this package... I would really thread carefully.

The thing about buying a camera package through mail is that you really don't know what you are getting, or the quality of the equipment.

I have owned about 5 Canon cameras that I bought new and never had any issues. So what is the issue with this package? The quality is just terrible. Let's start with the lenses - they are garbage. The 2 extra lenses are poor quality and will make your pics be out of focus most of the time. They are just really cheap lenses and makes everything look blurred most of the time.

The standard lens that comes with the camera is just as awful, nothing special here, but at least you won't have out of focus problems as you will with the other two lenses.

The camera itself is okay, but like I said, this is the least good quality I've gotten from all of my Canon purchases.

It's too late to return the camera for me. Now my option is to spend a lot more money for some good quality lenses - and see if this will solve the quality issue. This will make it okay but still won't be superior quality that you would expect from Canon.

Again, you might be better off getting something from a local camera shop... or getting this package but devoting at least a full day to testing it right away before the 30 day return period expires.

It’s a Christmas present for my wife so we haven’t used it of removed it from the individual boxes. I will tell you that it came well packaged, shipping was fast and seems exactly as described. This camera was recommended by a friend (who is a professional photographer)as a good starter camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: This Canon Rebel T6 is a great "move up" from a point & shoot digital camera.
reviews.reviewText: Everything that was supposed to come with this bundle was in the box. As far as I can tell, it all is good quality. I can't say anything about the 'macro' or 'wide angle' lenses that came with the kit since I haven't had a chance to use them. What I can say is that a better tripod SHOULD have been included. The one supplied seems to be sturdy enough for a point & shoot camera, not for a camera like the T6. Also the packaging from Amazon was poorly done. The basic kit was in it's own Ritz box. That box and all of the other parts of this bundle were in another box well taped up. THAT box was then placed, by I assume Amazon, in a 3rd larger box with craft paper balled up for padding. That 3rd box was poorly taped with one end not even attached. That last box should have been better sealed.

Very nice camera. My first DSLR. I bought this kit with the 75-300 separately and saved a few dollars over the kit that includes the extra lens. It came with everything advertised except the extra battery BUT when I contacted the seller (RitzCamera) they sent it out immediately.

I've had fun with it so far. Easy menus. Everything fits well. Plenty of info on YT about using it because it is a popular brand. I'm really happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Camera for photography... Bad for Videos
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this with the intent to film some YouTube videos. Since I'm new to this, I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a camera and this deal seemed like it would work out for my needs. Unfortunately, it doesn't. I didn't realize the audio would be SO BAD...like you can barely hear anything and forget about purchasing any external microphones as this camera doesn't support it! If you're a beginner and your phone camera works pretty well... stick to that. I could've saved $400 by sticking with my phone until I had enough to purchase a pretty good camera that fit my needs. Now, I'm stuck with this camera and I just may pass it along to my kids and eventually teach them how to take photos with it. It appears to be only good for that tbh.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not Canon quality by any stretch of the imagination!
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed in the poor quality of this kit! I bought it because I needed one replacement lens and could use a wide angle as well, However, the pictures do not focus properly with this camera and lenses.. I had no problem taking action photos with my current cameras and lenses (all Canon), but this camera and lenses is not a Canon quality. What did you sell me? I think I should have a refund!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent camera and accessories, great seller
reviews.reviewText:
As a very newbie photographer, I found it a bit daunting at first to jump into everything, but my wife and I love our new camera. The product is excellent.

I love the items Ritz Camera has included. There was an issue with some of the items, but thanks to Ritz and Amazon, the issues were quickly corrected. If you have any issues, I believe they will get back to you quickly to resolve the issue.

I highly recommend buying this set because of the various items you get, their quality, and the quality of the customer service if you need it. Thank you Ritz Camera!

My order was missing the extra battery and the extra memory card!
It appears that Ritz camera have had many similar issues on this item and similar items; Is this poor assembly of the components or is this intentional?
Pat
Would like to hear from others who have had the same issue .......... thanks.

The Camera arrived when it was promised. Everything in box was on the list of Kit items. I bought this for my wife. She is very exited about the purchase. She wants to take photography classes to get the best benefit from all ye items in this package. Regardless of age you can't go wrong with the TV camera and bundle. The price is the best I have seen. The pictures are much better than a phone camera without a doubt.

reviews.reviewTitle: Greater starter kit for amateur photographers.
reviews.reviewText:
We bought this camera for my husband who wants to get more serious about his photography hobby. We have been very happy with everything in this package. We've gone out a few times and he's used all the various lenses and the tripod, etc. It is not super high end stuff, but for an amateur or just for hobby photography its a good starter pack.
When we received the order it was missing the extra battery and the second SD card. I emailed the seller right away and they sent the missing items right away.

I am just starting out in photography, so this bundle is just what I wanted. The camera itself has so many bells and whistles I'm intimidated, but I have taken some pretty great photos in auto mode. The other items in the bundle are also nice to have. The 50 inch tripod is just a very basic one, and not too sturdy, but it will be fine for now. The price for this bundle is also very good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great gift for my grandson just starting in photography
reviews.reviewText: He has just started using it. But he told me he really likes how easy it is to use. The bag it not doing well. Seams coming apart.

Great value for what you get. Love the extra lenses. The camera has plenty of great features, especially at that price. I was a hobbyist photographer, back when cameras were film only. I fell out of the hobby when my life got busy. I've had mostly point and shoots since I went digital, but always missed the artistic element of the hobby. This is perfect for starting out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent camera, quality and package pricing!
reviews.reviewText: WOW,Great camera and a great price for a quality package. I purchased the complete package and it all arrived in excellent condition without any items missing. The shipping company delivered at 8am Dec.24 so I told my wife that her gift was at the front door. She screamed and cried tears of joy when she opened the door, 1 big box of Christmas happiness!!! Her other camera was destroyed on a rafting trip but hadn't been able to get her a replacement until now... I'm glad I waited, thanks to Ritz Camera and Amazon for my 1st purchase!

Coming from manual focus 35mm SLR cameras, this is my fist digital SLR. I like the fact that manual focus is an option, which allows for blurring some background at times it is needed. I am familiar with Canon and did not find it too difficult to start taking photos straight away.
Still learning all the features though, but so far I like it.
I would recommend getting a kit that includes what you need. My kit came with camera, 18-55mm lense, 75-300mm lense, filters, two batteries (with charger,) a table top tripod, and a carry bag. Has all I really need/want.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect camera if you want more than a aim and click!
reviews.reviewText: This camera and accompanying lenses, etc are perfect for my grandson’s First college photography class - and personal use. With some minimal help he has gotten quite proficient with his photography- something he had never attempted before. Thank you for the quick delivery and great product. I have now purchased three of these and not been disappointed ever.

The camera body and the "reg" lens along with the bigger telephoto lens are a snap to get the hang of for a beginner like me. You have to understand I am still clinging to my old 35mm Minolta. I've had cheap digital cameras before but was unimpressed. I still haven't learned to use the small screw on tele lens or the little close up lens but I haven't had time to really mess with them. This package gives you everything you need right out of the box. Plus Cannon has a great website with lots of lessons and tips for people new to DLSR camera's.

I loved everything! Not all the accessories were the Polaroid brand like it shows in the pictures so I reached out to Amazon and Ritz Camera and both were amazing. Both went above and beyond and I got what I was promised. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great package for a great price
reviews.reviewText: Just about everything came exactly as described. The only thing that wasn't was the camera bag. It was some off brand and not cannon. I'm not the least bit upset about that though as I had already planned to buy a bigger and nicer bag long before I ordered the camera. I've used the camera a few times and it's a dream. Everything is very nice and was backaged very carefully. Honestly, this is probably the best starter kit you could get for this price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great bundle for almost any occasion
reviews.reviewText: I took the camera out for a trial run photographing the sandhill crane migration. It captured some wonderful shots, and I found the sports setting helpful in capturing flapping wings. I did find that the auto-focus didn't work perfectly in all conditions. As the sun set, and before it rose, it was hard to get it to focus automatically, so I had to rely on my vision and focus manually. I am more than happy with the purchase overall, and look forward to many more photo adventures. The battery life is great! I took 1500 shots without putting a dent in the battery display.

This is a great product bundle at a very good price. Purchased as a gift for my son and his family, who are expecting twins shortly.
This camera is easy to use, produces great pictures and is very dependable. I have had mine for many years and very satisfied with it!!
I didn't care for the gadget bag, would have preferred a teardrop backpack instead (personal preference)

reviews.reviewTitle: but it just wasted me a lot of time to buy it
reviews.reviewText: It missed the replacement battery and a 32GB SD card. I know I can return it, but it just wasted me a lot of time to buy it, wait for it and return it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Spend more money and invest in your child future graduation party with quality photos.
reviews.reviewText: The 75 - 300 EF lens is terrible for action shots or lit fields like baseball fields. Don't get an EOS Rebel series. Invest in a better cannon and a lens with Image Stabilization (IS) and a lower f number like 2.8. You will not regret investing in a better camera!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Canon Camera - GOOD.......Ritz Gear Accessories - BAD
reviews.reviewText: Very nice entry level DSLR camera. The one star reduction is for the RITZ GEAR accessories. The Slave Flash does not work in the slave mode, and the two smaller lens are of poor quality. The camera with accessory kit was $50 more than just the camera and the 2 cannon lens kit...so, I got 2 tripods, some lens filters and cheap lens cleaning kit for $50. I suggest you avoid the accessory kit and just invest that $50 into better quality gear.

I like taking photos of everything even little critters that go bump in the night. Camera works great so far I don't see it draining the batteries after a few minutes of use and that is always awesome the bag wasn't the greatest you kinda have to shove to get everything to fit but worth it so far for the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: This kit is fine. The kit doesn't have all the name brands ...
reviews.reviewText: This kit is fine. The kit doesn't have all the name brands as stated but close. I did think there was an extra battery, there isn't. That said, it is still a decent price for add ons for a first camera, they just aren't the best quality add ons...the slave flash is pretty cheap but functional and most beginners don't use this type of thing right away anyway.

Bought this for my daughter who is a broadcast journalism student in High School and planning to go to college for the same thing. It is a really great kit but I wish I did my homework a little more. The T6 does not have a external microphone input like the T6i (which is what they have at the school). Besides that it is pretty much the same camera. She has used it for several video projects already and will be a good camera for years to come.

I received the camera and opened it, while checking everything i noticed i only got one 32GB and one 16GB SD card(this came out of the blister) instead of two 32GB SD card as shown in the product description, at this point i was really disappointed but i kept searching for the rest of the goodies and then i got the surprise that I didn't receive either the spare camera battery that is also shown in the product description. So i'm wondering how and when Ritz Camera it's going to send to me the things that i'm missing?

reviews.reviewTitle: The camera and lenses are great. What's just ok about it
reviews.reviewText: The camera and lenses are great. What's just ok about it? the camera bag will not hold all the lenses and the camera, it's pretty much useless unless you use it for the camera alone. The kit was short one battery but Amazon issued me a credit to purchase the one missing. Good job Amazon.

The product arrived in great packaging and condition but Canon is not that user-friendly and the type of pictures I want I don't think I can achieve with this camera I may have to spend more money or take a photography class but this product is still awesome for people who are more tech-savvy.
I received everything exactly as described.

reviews.reviewTitle: Already taking great pics the first day
reviews.reviewText: I included some of the pics I took on the first day. My wife and I are beginners and from the start we feel pretty confident this camera will help us develop our skills quickly and take amazing shots. Easy setup, read the instructions and walk a few Youtube videos. All the extras came with the box as pictured, but I'm not sure if I will use the add on lens much. Overall great value.
I was super excited to receive this since it was going to be gifted to my sister, for Christmas. Wayyyyy too many missing pieces... 5 to be exact. Sending back immediately!!

reviews.reviewTitle: This experience was terrible. Had high hopes to get this camera and ...
reviews.reviewText: This experience was terrible. Had high hopes to get this camera and kit by Christmas. I received a package I thought was the complete kit on the 23rd. I did not not open it as it was a gift. When my wife opened it the next day on our anniversary, the camera and lenses were missing. Who forgets to put the camera in the package. Have never been so embarrassed in my life. Just awful.

I have a problem with the camera T6, I bought it less than a week ago, I realize that when taking photos in low light I get a white spot in the same place, with photos with greater light not much is observed, the camera does not It helps me if it has a pixel fault since what you observe is as if it kept a dead pixel. I can send a test of the pictures taken. I need help if I have a solution.

Note: Do the test with another lens and the same point comes out, it is not dirty since the same point appears in the first images.

Fantastic value. Everything was included in mine, other than the extra Polaroid battery and the two 32 Vivitar SD cards; I got a 32 and a 16, one Vivitar and one Polaroid. However, this doesn't diminish the amazing value of this package. The camera takes beautiful photos, and I'm very glad to have gotten it.

reviews.reviewTitle: The product is awesome for beginner photographers
reviews.reviewText: This is a second review of this purchase. The product is awesome for beginner photographers, and inclusive for a second camara. I had to wait for the second memory card and battery which did not come with the original shipment. I wrote Ritz Camara and they responded until I wrote a bad review... Besides that everything is perfect.

I got this camera about 2 years ago and use it very very lightly. The shuttle on it broke recently, and I haven't even used it for months.... Now it is costing me a lot of money to fix. Worked good while I had it but very hesitant to pay that much money to get it fixed if it will just break again. Very disappointing for sure. It appears that shuttle is stuck.

Wife loves it as a Birthday present and the few pictures she has taken so far are wonderful. She loves the Telephoto Lens for close ups. Only Issue is we received 32MB card instead of 64MB card but seller will send appropriate storage card. Very satisfied with purchase and U-Tube video's are very informative and helpful.

This camera kit is definitely worth every penny! I did tons of research and price comparisons before buying. Everything I would need for the type of pictures I’m wanting to take are in this kit. I was a little nervous about the quality of some of the products in the kit, but everything has been great so far. In the pictures the wide angle and telephoto lens showed that they were Polaroid (I was nervous about that) but they were both Ritz Gear in the box! I would recommend this for a first time camera buyer (like myself). It has everything you would need starting off and the picture quality is much better than a phone.

The kit as a great choice for anyone looking to really get into photography without wanting to dump in close to $1000 just to see if they'd like it. The camera is well-made, takes quality pictures, and comes loaded with a generous amount of features. The added items to the kit are more than enough to carry a user for quite some time. The number of settings and tools can seem a bit daunting at first but the user guide can walk you through just about any question you may have.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not even single product missing! Awesome deal. Just go for it.
reviews.reviewText:
This is my First Amazon review, usually dont find time/waste time in writing one, but felt worth writing for this one. I had read review by others of not receiving the extra battery and receiving only one memory card. I was reluctant to buy while I thinking the same might happen to me, but went for it anyways as these are kinda extras. But so happy, that each and every product shown in the picture arrived, not one missing.
Another thing that I was worried was the brand of the other products of many receiving cheap quality and some unknown brand. Here is the list of what I received.
Of course genuine CANON - Camera, 18-55 and 75 - 300 lenses, 1 charger,1 battery, 1 Strap, 1 shoulder bag)
Here's brand of the other products that I received:
Flash - Polaroid
Telephoto and Wide angle lens - Polaroid
57" Tripod - Polaroid
12" Mini flexible tripod - XIT Photo
Remote shutter release - XIT Photo
OTG USB - Ritz Gear
5 - piece camera cleaning kit - Polaroid
Spare LP E10 Battery - Polaroid (1300 mAh)
32 GB SDHC memory card (2 units) - Lexar
Filters - Polaroid
Memory card holder - Polaroid
Lens cap strap - Polaroid
Level check - Local brand
Screen protector - Polaroid

Exceptional bundle. Highly recommended.

Time to explore my new member in the e-family!

I'm in LOVE with my new camera. It arrived early, I received all the items listed, the camera and accessories are New and are all working properly, and the picture quality is Outstanding. Earning 5 🌟 for picture quality and 5🌟 for durability because its a Cannon.

I especially love my Telephoto and Wide lenses. The telephoto lense really Zooms in and is a great attachment on either 18-55 & 75-300 lenses. Earning 5 🌟 for Versatility. #HighlyReccommend

Overall this was the best purchase I've made for a Great price. Earning 5 🌟 for Cannon Kit

Gave this to my 15 yr old for Christmas. It was a hit, he's currently trying to become famous on YouTube lol. Quality product with a ton of stuff included. He was taking impressive photos by Christmas afternoon and putting a slide show on the TV for everyone by evening.
The bag must have been upgraded from previous reviews- it's a cannon bag and is large enough to hold all of the necessary lenses/camera/flash.
A good purchase thus far, everyone's happy.

I was hesitant in buying this camera from Amazon due to the high price. I absolutely don't regret it! It is great for the price due to all the goodies that come along with it. I barely began to use it and it takes beautiful pictures, overall I am happy with the purchase!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Impressive photos and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I have been wanting to buy a camera that would take awesome pictures of flowers. I love the ease of use and the quality of the photos. I am a beginner and this camera meets my expectations. I had read all the reviews prior to purchasing it... No regrets I just love it. Check out my first pictures of flowers, I used the automatic features, it's so easy point and shoot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great SLR camera for the money!
reviews.reviewText: This camera is amazing. I upgraded from a mid-2000s Canon Rebel. The new technology alone makes upgrading a no-brainer. Haven't used half of the extra items that came with it, but I'm sure at some point I will. Battery life is ok, but we use the 'live view' a lot and I know that uses a lot of battery.

Everything was great! The only thing that was really cheap and broken was the ritz gear light, but other than that everything works well and the camera takes really high quality pictures. Would buy again. THE ONLY THING I SHOULD HAVE KNOW IS THAT YOU CAN CONNECT AN EXTERNAL MICROPHONE TO THE CAMERA.

reviews.reviewTitle: Camera is great but accessories are not Cannon and there was only ...
reviews.reviewText: Camera is great but accessories are not Cannon and there was only 1 battery when 2 were shown in the picture; seller was not willing to honor its picture description of 2 batteries.

After some research I decided to purchase this camera to take pictures of Our National parks when I travel. That starts in a couple of weeks. I have been playing around with the camera it appears to be easy to use in the picture quality is excellent for the money

The photos shown for the premium 4 lenses bundle clearly shows two batteries. The description states the bundle comes with a “replacement battery”. Only one battery came with this bundle and that was the one in the camera box itself. That is not a replacement battery it is the ONLY battery. I don’t like being duped.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great purchase even though the package components displayed is not accurate
reviews.reviewText: Great camera for everyday use or any special occasion. Very easy to use that my 12 year was able to take great pictures on automatic mode. My complaint is that the seller falsly advertises all the components that arrive with the camera. There is only one flexible tripod, no additional flash, and one 32 GB card. The cannon charger doesn’t fit the battery. Other than that the camera is a great buy for the amount charged.

Several reviews on here do a really nice job of accurately describing the premium box I ordered. The value for price is pretty fantastic considering the camera alone is worth the same amount. I would agree with many other folks in these reviews about the camera bag- it’s far too small and I’ve already ordered a new one. Otherwise, the acceories and camera are exactly what I was hoping for
There are a lot extra items that make having such a good quality camera worth it! The extra SD cards are a big win for me

All items except for the memory chips were received as expected. The memory was not the right size/speed as denoted in the picture, but we're still able to use it. Otherwise, everything else is working just right.

Received from Ritz camera on time. Great value in the bundle. Costco sells the same camera with the two lenses for the same price. This bundle has more freebies. Also ordered separately from Amazon a 100 macro lense and a ring flash.

I am a total beginner but have a family member who knows a lot about cameras and photography. I was pretty overwhelmed by everything but took it slowly with the equipment and spent time with her to gain some confidence. The camera takes beautiful pictures! There are some things in the bundle that I won’t use (the 2 extra lenses, for example). Using WiFi to move photos to the tablet is great. Overall, so far (have had it for a week), I am happy with the purchase and I think it was a really good deal!

reviews.reviewTitle: ... all the gadgets and gizmo's that came with were perfect. My only complaints are that the camera carrying ...
reviews.reviewText: The camera and all the gadgets and gizmo's that came with were perfect. My only complaints are that the camera carrying case does not have enough room to store all the little pieces that come with the camera and that after only having the carrying case for about 4 months the top layer of material is starting to rip around the edges. Overall nothing with the camera itself is wrong just the products that come with it

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera package at a terrific price
reviews.reviewText: I checked for this same camera (without all the accessories) at both Costco and Sam’s club. Ritz Camera through Amazon had the best price and all the accessories as a terrific bonus.

I want to take pictures of the birds on my bird feeders. I guess I'll have train them to ignore all the beeping an other noises. Was hoping it would zoom further away. Great for still life. Don't know if i can teach them to hold still that long. Takes forever to take one/two pictures. Too loud.
Not much to hang on to without putting your hands on all those buttons.
Don't know how to send a picture.... Later.

Attached is a photo I took in natural sunlight. This camera is fantastic and the settings are easy to learn. The best part about it is I can choose the exact point of focus and it will focus exactly where I want it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Missing pieces in the accessory pack.
reviews.reviewText: I just received the box today so I can't comment on the quality of pictures this camera takes. However the box of accessories was missing the second memory card as well as missing the second battery. Only received one of each. The picture clearly shows two of each.

reviews.reviewTitle: Package arrived, and all that was in the camera ...
reviews.reviewText: Package arrived, and all that was in the camera box was nothing. No camera, just the empty T6 box. Total scam. DO NOT BUY from Ritz Camera.

This camera was purchased for my granddaughter. She has just had it for a couple weeks and is just learning how to use it so I can't yet rate the durability or versatility but it is a very nice camera and she loves it.

The product and all its components arrived as described and on time. I'm excited to get started taking pictures. As a beginner, I'm impressed with the quality of the snaps I've taken so far. I'll update this review as time goes on. I feel this is a great deal for the price and can't wait to share some of my photos with the world!

Probably would've gotten 5 star had I actually received all my items...I was missing 4 items out of the bundle. One of the memory cards, the flash, the larger tripod, as well as the replacement battery. I bought this bundle for a reason and after a lot of research. I like every aspect of it, and it's extremely disappointing when it doesn't come with everything. Amazon is of no help due to it being repackaged by the seller. Have yet to hear back from the seller. I bought this as a birthday gift for myself as well as we have a baby on the way and wanted to have everything when he/she arrives.

I researched cameras for a while and came across this one. I had it in my cart for a long time before deciding to buy it and i love it. The picture quality is great and since I'm a beginner I find it easy to use. Loving it so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: This was the best bundle i could find
reviews.reviewText: This was the best bundle i could find! The camera is great, the extras are good quality. I gave it 4 stars because the camera, even though it states is good for beginners, Is still tricky to navigate. and I am a pretty techie guy. So, study up on DSLR's before use!

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't buy this camera, unless you're planning on keeping it forever.
reviews.reviewText:
This camera was suggested to me, as I wanted to learn about photography, and it is supposedly good for beginners. So I purchased it back in December.
The Camera is not bad, but as I've improved my photography skills, recently purchased a more advanced camera. I went to sell this one to recoup some of the money for the new one, and can only get around $150 for it. I get making a profit, but i've only had the thing for 4 months..... Pricing is disappointing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Won't work after just a year!
reviews.reviewText: The camera was great - until it stopped working! We've tried to have it fixed, but the person we brought it to can't find out what's wrong with it. We'll keep trying to find someone else to look at it/fix it but really shouldn't have to after paying $750 and not even a full year of light use! Purchased Feb. 2018
New to photography. Was overwhelmed when I started pulling out all the accessories, now excited. Easy camera, can't wait to really get into this.

reviews.reviewTitle: I could not be more pleased and amazed at the quality of the photos captured
reviews.reviewText: Based purely on an entry level guy type opinion, I could not be more pleased and amazed at the quality of the photos captured. The bundle was well worth the investment, to get started on the photographer hobby. And, may suit this new hobby for some time. Very pleased, and very happy with the customer support response. Literally, within 1 hour. I'll be back.
Love the ease of use and many options. The camera feels comfortable in the hands. Lots of great features and nice photos, as a result. I love having an SLR again, after the point and shoot variety.

Did not receive all items as described. Also my camera box was opened and the Canon bag was switched to an off brand bag. The “extras” were not as pictured. Non of the extra lenses were Canon as pictured. They were Ritz brand and none of them fit on the camera. Will be returning and purchasing from a legit seller.

I bought this for an upcoming trip. I am not a photographer by any means. When you set the camera on automatic, iy takes great pictures with ease. The package comes with almost everything you could need. The only think I added was a 300mm telephoto lens.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super happy with this camera and the included swag
reviews.reviewText: More in the box than I ever expected! Daughter loved it Christmas morning. Excellent Canon quality--has the feel and the click of an old school AE-1. Beautiful piece of engineering. I may have to order another for myself. Oh, and the WiFi upload--whoa! Mind blowing!

This is a great camera. This is the 3rd Canon Rebel I have owned. My only disappointment is that sending photos is not user friendly and I haven't been successfully able to do so. Overall thought I am well pleased with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't buy from Ritz Camera--you will not receive Polaroid brand ...
reviews.reviewText: Don't buy from Ritz Camera--you will not receive Polaroid brand items for the accessories. You will receive generic approximations instead.

I am still learning to use this camera. I like the automatic mode so far. There are a lot of features and options. The picture quality is excellent. I gave 5 stars because I appreciate the customer service. I did not receive one of the items in the kit. Customer service responded within 48 hours and sent me the missing item within the same week.

Only downside is instruction booklet is not very good. Several people commented that they didn't receive the extra battery. The extra battery is packed in a small box. I almost threw away the other battery it is packed in the Canon box . It is tapped to the back of a piece of cardboard and easily can be missed

reviews.reviewTitle: I am so happy with this purchase
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with this purchase! I was ready to step up camera wise, but afraid to spend big bucks on features I can't or don't need to use. This was a nice compromise, and takes amazing pictures. All the extras were nice, and I have already used most of them. Great camera and great value.

reviews.reviewTitle: my brothers first dslr and he couldn't be any more ...
reviews.reviewText: my brothers first dslr and he couldn't be any more excited. went through the gear myself and was very impress with everything included for the price!

Was missing the 16GB memory card for one. Products were poorly boxed. There was no padding in the long box which left the items free to slide around and possibly get broken. Fortunately, nothing happened to anything, unlike some other buyers. The products themselves are great, the price was great and I'm satisfied. Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use if you know the basics. Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera. Very easy to use. Lots of stuff with it. Battery last a long time. I love taking pictures of my kids. Very clear pictures.

reviews.reviewTitle: I received this gift from my husband and I love it. I've only been using it for a ...
reviews.reviewText: I received this gift from my husband and I love it. I've only been using it for a few weeks and it comes with so many pieces that I haven't gone through them yet but so far the pictures are perfect. I'm excited to continue to learn about all the parts

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent starter kit, missing smaller tripod.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived with every item pictured/listed OTHER THAN the smaller Polaroid tripod. Haven't had it long enough to give a proper review, but everything included seems to be of decent quality, the camera is gorgeous and all of the buttons are smarty placed and accessible, more so than the last 3 older Rebels I've used. Tactile feedback on the buttons is good. Do not plan on fitting everything into the camera bag, you will not be able to. But I do like minimal pocket design of the bag, you get the main compartment with an adjustable divider, and one large pocket outside of that, as opposed to 8 or 9 little tiny pockets everywhere that don't properly fit anything.
From the moment I received this camera the battery never fully charged. Now the battery only charges to one bar and then dies. Very disappointing.
