I really love it, it works really great! I haven't been able to try all the accessories that came with the camera, but I will make sure to try them out whenever I have a chance.
The camera works well. I'm enjoying all the different lenses from the kit. The camera bag broke after the second uses. (Custom service took care of that) But, overall the kit is not needed.

Missing the extra battery and the other 32gb SD card !!
UPDATE!!!I emailed Ritz and they said they would send the missing items but just received a 16gb not a 32. The battery pack is also an unknown brand and it's supposed to be canon, very disappointed!
This is a great product for the price
My first camera. Has all the extras, some I don't know how to use yet, but hope to learn. Was able to get our family pic with everyone in it this Christmas. Was super excited to figure that out. 😄

reviews.reviewTitle: I bought this for my wife and she loved it. I thought buying the kit was easier ...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my wife and she loved it. I thought buying the kit was easier than adding on as she went along. The price and shipping time were great. An extra battery would have made this kit perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: THIS IS A AWESOME STARTING BUNDLE
reviews.reviewText: I liked everything about this product. The only downside is that the camera does not have a mic port. Other than that I recommend the bundle to everyone who is just starting out. I have been using it for my Instagram and youtube posts. Both are @iankilmer if you wanna see what everything looks like.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great deal at a great price
reviews.reviewText: 5/5 for the camera, 4/5 for accessories. Everything came as promised and is a great camera package. One problem was that the telephoto lens has spots all over the inside of the lens, rendering it unusable. A quick and relatively painless call to Amazon and they issued a partial refund. So all in all a great deal at a great price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good camera, extra gear a little sketchy.
reviews.reviewText: A couple issues: The description says it comes with a spare battery, but what is should say is it comes with a battery. Spare means extra, this is misleading. The tripod is a complete piece of junk. One of the legs fell off almost immediately. Cheap gear.
Not satisfied with the product. Missing additional battery. Not polariod
Nice camera set , my Daughter picked out for her yearbook class next year takes good pics and video, the near field comm is nice , it sends pics right to your phone

We researched this camera and the many different deals out there. We are happy with our selection. Takes some research on becoming a good photographer. My wife has always wanted a nice camera. She seems very happy with this camera.

I am extremely pleased with this purchase. The camera bag was actually a Cannon camera bag. The only thing that was missing when I opened the box was the mini tripod, which I contacted Ritz Camera and it delivered within 3 days (hence the 4 star instead of 5 star review). Ritz had excellent customer service. The camera works great and I am very pleased with the quality of accessories. Just for 4 lenses, the camera, and SD card this is well worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Value. Needs better description of kit pieces.
reviews.reviewText: Overall great value and for the most part as advertised. Camera is amazing and we love it. The only thing, and it’s not an issue just an annoyance, but the value pack that came with it never really had a description of what all came with it and what it showed in the picture didn’t completely match what we got. Overall still a great value, this kit cost less than buying just the camera by itself at Best Buy. Just wish description was more clear and exact.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Camera. Great package so many extras.
reviews.reviewText: Well, I'm a first time Buyer/User of a fancy camera. Bought it for video. Actually bought the wrong camera. Truly thought I was buying the T6i. Which is much better for my needs. Alas, It does shoot great HD video as people expect from DSLR's. I haven't captured to much footage yet but so far I can't complain about a camera that is doing exactly what it was designed for.
We bought if for our daughter but we all ended liking this. It has the basic things you may need to start in a good way into photography.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Entry Camera for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I had just started to get interested in photography as a hobby and needed an entry level camera. This was perfect as it wasn't over the top expensive yet still works with pricier lenses. Well worth the value.

reviews.reviewTitle: ... (An issue I noticed in prior reviews) and in excellent condition. I've yet to try out the camera ...
reviews.reviewText: Everything came as described with no missing items (An issue I noticed in prior reviews) and in excellent condition. I've yet to try out the camera and associated peripherals but will update the review once I do. So far I'm happy with the purchase.
Kind of difficult to use. My boyfriend’s Samsung camera takes better pictures. Kind of bummed I didn’t use it until after the 30 day return period.

Wow! Just, wow! This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. The camera is amazing. The extra gear is thoughtfully complimentary to me getting started with photography. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.

At first we were very hesitant to whether buying it or not since we weren't able to see it before actually purchasing it. it is the most amazing camera for just the right price it takes great pictures and it has a long lasting battery life. The other things that came with it are great quality and would def. purchase again 10/10

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality camera bundle with very good lenses. I particularly like the zoom lens
reviews.reviewText: Box arrived with ALL promised items. High quality camera bundle with very good lenses. I particularly like the zoom lens. After skimming the manual, I was shooting decent sports action photos at my daughter's track meet the next morning. This fits my "beginner" SLR needs perfectly and it's a terrigic VALUE. I ordered a separate (softer) neck strap...otherwise the bundle is perfect.
Nice camera for beginners. Good value. Great customer service.

reviews.reviewTitle: A pictures worth a thousand words
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for my son's father. He loves to take photos and edit them. I was very happy with the product when it arrived. And he is in love with the camera. Gotta get more lenses for him now so he can do his thing and I can get family pics done for free lol.

Inexpensive, easy to use, and takes solid photos. I'm pretty excited about this purchase. I didn't want to part with too much money, so I bought this bundle and have no regrets. Great add-on items and it arrived quickly.

Photo quality is very good as well.

What is pictured here was exactly what I received. All of the "extras" were the Polaroid brand, and work great. I'm a first time "real camera" buyer and I was looking for something that would allow me to take pictures, mostly of kids and family, and then blow them up for printing. The camera itself is really easy to use and understand. The camera bag is nice and holds 2 of the 4 lenses at any time. A great purchase and a great deal!!

The 75-300 lens in the package has been great to get super wildlife images. And, the 18-55 lens is perfect for scenery, and wildflower photography. All my photographic efforts are outdoors, and I love this new package.

reviews.reviewTitle: If your a photographer this is a powerful tool for your gear bag.
reviews.reviewText: Fast easy to use and powerful tool for your gear bag
It's a camera that's easy to use right out of the box. It is great for beginners, yet has many advance features that will keep advanced photographers very happy.
Professional image quality, very easy to operate. Suitable for beginners.

reviews.reviewTitle: Already used this camera and look forward to many years ...
reviews.reviewText: Already used this camera and look forward to many years of usage. It replaced my Canon D20 and is lighter in weight many more megapixels, has a much larger screen and can do so much more.

According to the picture, there is two batteries and 64GB SD card with the product but I have got only one. Missing the extra battery and the other 64gb SD card !, I emailed to Ritz but never get email back form Ritz. Very Disappointed!
Good camera for a good value except it's shown in the ads that there were 2 batteries but there's only one in the box when it was shipped. You should ammend your ads seller.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does NOT Include 2 Batteries Despite Product Image Clearly Showing Otherwise!!!
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our daughter for a Christmas present and it seems like a good bundle but I was disappointed to find that there is only one battery. Despite there clearly being two batteries in the image. The Amazon rep told me there was only one "replacement battery" in the product description. I countered that there are two in the photo, that one battery comes with the camera itself, and that a "replacement battery" is an additional item, to REPLACE the one that comes with it. Otherwise it's *not* a REPLACEMENT battery, it is THE battery. Normally I have much better experience with Amazon's customer service, but not this time. Disappointing.
So happy with this camera! It's my first DSLR and it's so nice. Very fun to experiment with on Manual but also a bunch of other settings that are less work to figure out haha :)

When I first started looking into purchasing this canon package I had asked a couple of my photographer friends what they thought about the Canon Rebel and they told me I better scoop of this deal. I am very impressed with all that came with this package deal and the quality of the product and picture quality. Quite impressive!!!
Bought as a gift for my semi pro photographer son. He chose it, and LOVES it
This is a great little bundle for the price. Slight learning curve onthe camera, but it has a lot of great features. So far loving this camera and everything in the bundle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Camera is awesome! We were not impressed with some of the ...
reviews.reviewText: Camera is awesome! We were not impressed with some of the lenses and equipment that came with the kit. They did not fit properly. However, Ritz Camera was great to work with and tried to help us fit them and when they didn't, they sent us new lenses that worked this time. Overall love the camera!!!
very happy with this camera package!!! lots of accessories, still learning all the different things it can do, great pictures!
Amazing camera came with everything I needed to start modeling on my own terms again. All you need to but is lighting depending on what you are using it for. Great buy.

I posted a previous review for what I thought was this camera, but it was for the accessory STRAP. It won't make any sense, so I'll post this review again here. Very user-friendly camera with intuitive controls. It takes awesome pictures.

reviews.reviewTitle: This kit was a really good deal and I'm glad I got it
reviews.reviewText: This kit was a really good deal and I'm glad I got it. My kit included Polaroid and Ritz Camera accessories. I haven't tried everything yet, but it all seems to be good quality--at least good enough for me and my amateur photography. I look forward to using my new camera for many years.

the accessories do not fit on the camera. the extra lenses don’t go on. waste of money
please contact me to fix.
Bought this as a starter set for my teenager who is a budding filmmaker. Has everything you need to get started except the video card FYI. So be sure to purchase that separately.
Love this beginner camera!
Very pleased with this product as a starter pack it includes a lot of items. I am a beginner so this has many things for me to get to know how to use the camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: The camer's are easy to use and the quality of the pictures is ...
reviews.reviewText: Was so excited to receive this Cannon Rebel bundle from Ritz Camera - I had been pricing this model and cant believe the deal I got with all the accessories I could ever want. I have been a Cannon customer for the past 20 years with their point and shoot camera's . The camer's are easy to use and the quality of the pictures is excellent. Can't wait to get started usiing the Rebel.

reviews.reviewTitle: The images this thing produces are great! And I love how it has different settings
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Canon that I have owned, and wow! The images this thing produces are great! And I love how it has different settings, and comes with all the camera gear!

Absolutely love the purchase! Even though this is a starter kit for budding photographers, the quality and the value of the purchase made it irresistible. I couldn't believe the price and I've been itching to go out and take as much pictures as I can every weekend.

The Rebel is a great camera and was so easy to set up and start shooting. The picture quality is excellent and the camera easy to handle. The kit contained everything I needed without having to shop around for what is available and what I might need. Everything arrived promptly and in perfect condition.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's been a good while since I received this and I haven't used ...
reviews.reviewText: It's been a good while since I received this and I haven't used everything but I love my camera! I love everything I received, the packaging, carrying case. My pictures look really good. And everything does come included. My coworker loved it and she ended up buying one too! Lol! So yes DEFINITELY recommend it. Also good for beginners.

The camera came in great conditions, everything in a big box with some bubble wrap. It came with one charger and 2 rechargeable batteries. The bag is the one from the photo (canon). The 2 memory cards are only 16gb and not 32gb.
Everything you would need as a beginner photographer and then some. My photography game has increased tenfold.
I really like this camera, the bundle is great. But, maybe as they say that it is for beginners they should attach something that explains the use of some of the gadgets that they include in the box.

I purchased two; one for my daughter who has a new baby and one for myself. We shot away at Christmas time and were very pleased with our shots. Still have much to learn with all the accessories galore! We used the timer, small tripod and a couple of lenses. So far so good!

Fantastic price for a fantastic camera. This is a great kit for beginner and advanced photographers alike.

As mentioned by several other reviews, the carrying bag is a bit small. It is the perfect size for family outtings.

If you plan on having a day long photo session, I recommend getting a sling or backpack type bag.

Also, pick up the f1.8 50mm lens kit ($125)!
Muy fácil de usar
As advertised
This is marvelous. I love it and am learning how to use it. Have always used a point and shoot. This is so much better.

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera is awesome. Takes the best pictures
reviews.reviewText: This camera is awesome. Takes the best pictures. So many accessories come with this package. I love the WiFi capabilities on this camera.
nice camara is everething you wish for, still learnig but really happy so far

Love this camera. I’ve only had it for a week or two but it takes amazing photos. All the accessories in the bundle are great too. Only complaint I would have is the smaller tripod and the extra flash unit are cheap and I don’t think I’m going to use them. Still a great deal.
Missing the extra battery pack that should have been included
Amateur photographerv recipient very happy with this gift. Lots of extra inclusions & accessories.
Exactly what I thought I was getting love it nothing wrong at all
Exactly as described. Great camera and lenses. Quality products and delivered on time.
This is a nice camera with a wonderful bundle. Has everything I need to capture all the shots that I want.
Great buy for the price. I love my T6 and the accessories it came with really helped me to start out my photography hobby.

My girlfriend lives taking photos, but never had anything other than her phone to take them with. I decided to get this for her as a Christmas gift from the moment she opened her present she's been taking beautiful pictures of the whole family!

Great prize, great accesories.
Just the tripod feel a little cheap, but for the prize it was perfect

I purchased this camera for my 16 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it! She's taking dual enrollment college courses where graphic design is her major and she will be minoring in photography. She also participates in the photography club at her school. I think this is the perfect beginners camera for anyone that loves photography. I especially love all of the equipment that came with this bundle! We also purchased a 50 mm 1.8 to go along with this camera. The camera takes really good video but it's not a camera that you would want to use for video on a regular basis because it doesn't have a flip screen. The shutter speed is 3 fps which is slow so it's not idea for taking pictures of sports or any other fast paced action shots but it's good for portraits and street photography. It's not too heavy so it's the perfect light-weight camera so overall we love the camera and highly recommend it! It doesn't hurt that it's also very affordable!
Bought this camera for my daughter as a Christmas gift. It works great and she loves it. The pictures are outstanding,
This camera kit is great for beginners and intermediate users. Easy set up and beautiful pictures.
Love my new camera! 😍 Learning how to use it has been simple and all the extra goodies are well worth the price!!
Cheap inferior products that made up the bundle. Camera body and lenses, 55mm and 300mm were Canon products but the rest was junk.

reviews.reviewTitle: Where is the 2nd battery of the picture ?
reviews.reviewText:
Hi, this pack is a decepcion...
I'm sorry, i was watching the whole 50 differents packs of CANON cameras Rebel T6 to find the best pack, the only one with all i need, i though i got it, and in my list i needed the 2 battery, it was one of my selection criteriums...
And when i received the pack, everything was in it except the 2nd battery...
Ok there a little differences between the picture and the product, different brands... but not the 2nd battery.
Maybee you will say, there is only one battery in this pack BUT :
- on the picture you put 2 batteries (all 3 pictures)
- i saw this comment on amazon " Yes. In the kit I got the charger and two batteries - NWchatter answered on September 10, 2017"
- the description said : Canon LPE10 Rechargeable Lithium REPLACEMENT Battery
- the description do not mension the the charger so it's logic think the do not mension the original battery
So you understand i'm not happy with this pack and i really want to get the 2nd battery i need.

Edit: The cleaning fluid bottle is empty... great !

Purchased this as a package deal instead of Costco bulk item. Priced right and everything was inside as described. Quality is excellent. Of note:tabletop tripod not full tripod(it was probably noted but I didn’t see it initally) would definitely recommend this entire pkg for a great Xmas gift.
Will be great camera for our teen who is interested in photography. The bundle was great and price was awesome for everything!
Great starter kit for begginers. Good variety of equipment for the price.

So far, I love this camera. I look forward to expanding my limited knowledge of photography. However, due to my limitations previously noted, I wish there had been some instructions as to how to install and use the Polaroid wide angle and telephoto lenses. Right now, I don't even know how to get them attached to the camera, much less use them. I guess I will have to take everything to a camera shop and have them show me how. This is the only reason I gave this only 4 stars.
Una cámara liviana, de facil y de rapida manipulacion para no perder las buenas tomas. La recomiendo para aficionados y profesionales de la fotografía de la naturaleza.
Simple camera but does not have microphone jack to use external mic. Not a deal breaker but not on this unit. Takes great pictures!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a really nice bundle for a beginner
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice bundle for a beginner. The camera body is a perfect base with good features. The lenses are average, but will help you learn simple usage. I purchased a nicer macro lens from another retailer for shooting plastic models.
Everything is as described and a wonderful deal! One of the 64GB cards was missing and their customer service fixed the issue in record time. 10/10 would recommend this item and seller again.
Great kit to start with, especially for the price. Just about everything you need to start from scratch.
Great product
great set, just a bit more than I needed in the way of all the extras.
Taking pictures at a family event. The camera was awesome.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love it, it is more than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I love it, it is more than I expected, everything was included and I am very happy. Now I just need to learn how to use all it's features!
Good camera..

reviews.reviewTitle: still playing with but happy I got it
reviews.reviewText: still learning how to use it and what all the functions are but still a very neat camera

reviews.reviewTitle: Why in the world is there no 3.5mm mic input? Shouldn't this be a standard feature?
reviews.reviewText:
While this is a great introductory camera and kit in many ways, unfortunately there was no 3.5mm mic input on the camera. This was not clearly listed--which I get to some degree, as most products list what they have, not what they don't have. But a 3.5mm mic input on a camera with video recording capabilities seems like a steering wheel on a car--it isn't a feature, it's a necessity. This isn't Ritz's problem, as Canon does the same thing by not listing it on their info. But it certainly seems less than honest for anyone who lists this camera not to mention.

Unfortunately, we were taking the camera with us as a gift for a mission to homeless kids in Africa so they could make videos and grow their support base. We didn't discover this until after we arrived in Africa, so we couldn't take it back and exchange it as we don't have people coming back and forth regularly, so this choice to not list something that is a necessity for us to produce good videos will directly affect our ability to reach out to kids who live on the streets.

Other than that, it seems to be a decent starter camera. But if you do any videos at all, go a different direction.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't expect customer service from RitzCamara.
reviews.reviewText: Do not order from RitzCamera! I ordered the Canon Rebel T6 camera kit through RitzCamera because I thought their customer service would be great if I had any problems. I was so wrong! I was pleased with the camera and all of the accessories that came in the kit. I used the camera for a couple of days, but once I was able to download my photos, I noticed a black spot on all of the photos. I did some research and believe it is something on (or damage to) the sensor. I contacted Amazon and the only option I was given was to return everything. Other than the black spot, I like the camera and did not want to return it, but no option was given to exchange it for a camera without a defect. That same day I received an email from RitzCamera asking if I was satisfied with my order and "If, for any reason, you aren't completely satisfied, please reply to this email so that we may address your concerns before you leave a product review. We would love to hear from you and are committed to your total satisfaction". I responded to the email explaining the problem with the camera, asking what they would do to make it right. Here is the response I received: "When it comes to Amazon fulfilled orders we are very limited on what we are able to do as you must go to Amazon directly for larger matters." To me, that means: "Too bad, how sad, you're out of luck, we're not going to help you with the defective $600 camera we sent you." So much for being "committed to your total satisfaction"! I would give RitzCamera negative stars if I could.

I received this about a week ago and have loved using it.

Everything was included in the bundle, except for the cleaning spray, the bottle was empty.

It took a while, but I learned that the small lenses have to be screwed on to the Canon lenses; they are threaded and therefore do not fit the camera body. Other customers have said these extra lenses don't fit, but they do.

I have used all of the lenses a little, and love them. I am still learning how everything works, but so far I do love the camera and have taken almost 200 pictures. We recently took a trip to the Carolinas, and I took pictures of the sky, deer, birds, landscapes and animals in a small zoo. I took a few pictures from a moving vehicle, most of them came out clear, but a couple came out a little blurry - one from going around a corner, the other I don't remember why.

I would recommend this bundle and from this seller. I remember Ritz Camera stores from my childhood, so the name stuck in my mind. I am glad that I ordered from this company.

In addition, when I thought that the lenses didn't fit, I wrote the company and asked if I could exchange the product. They opened a ticket and responded within a couple of hours. Then after further research, I discovered that the lenses are threaded to fit on to the end of the Canon lenses and wrote them back saying that I no longer needed to exchange them, the ticket could be closed.

Although there was no transaction, the fact that their customer service department responded so quickly also impressed me

I do wish that I had photos to share. There isn't a CD to install the software for loading pictures on to the computer, that has to be downloaded from the website and I have yet to do that.

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera is the perfect camera for someone who wants to pursue a small ...
reviews.reviewText:
This camera is the perfect camera for someone who wants to pursue a small photography career. I got this camera a little over a year ago, use it many times a week, and I am satisfied every time I use it. It comes with many great accessories. It takes fantastic pictures. I ordered this camera because I was looking for a hobby and I knew that I enjoyed taking pictures. I searched for many different cameras but I will never regret the choice of this Canon EOS Rebel.

This camera has many accessories that can be used when taking pictures. It takes great pictures of sports, the outdoors, portraits, and more. This entire kit comes with lens that zoom out a great amount and lens that can take away glare! As much as I use this camera, I was happy to receive two batteries with the camera! This is a great way for one battery to charge while one is being used. All of the necessities are valuable and easy to use.

The camera itself has many different settings and options! The camera has a timer setting where you can set and walk away to position for a picture. It also has many different options such as; sports, manual, portrait, night, etc. The lenses are great as they have different ones to make pictures HD, take away glare, etc. This camera takes amazing pictures of just about anything. The camera is easy to maneuver and quick to figure out. Another great thing about this camera, is the SD card holds so much storage and allows many pictures to be held within the camera.

This camera is perfect for photographers or people who have a hobby in photography. Although this camera and kit is pricey, it is worth the amount paid. It includes many different things along with the camera. It is a great way to get a start on photography and have the necessities needed to assure the best pictures be taken.

LOVE it so far! I've used just about everything besides the external light and remote. This camera takes amazing photos! It's my first DSLR so I'm definitely still learning how to use it but with just the basics it has been great! The Tripod is not very tall so I'll have to get another one of those. The Wifi connection option is so wonderful! So much easier to take self-portraits when you can see where the camera is pointed with your phone. NOTE: It IS a tiny bit annoying that any time you change the settings on the camera, it disconnects from your phone and you have to reconnect everything. The camera bag is also excellent quality! I don't think you can go wrong with this kit.

I have not purchased an SLR camera since my Canon AE1 Program (film) back in the 1980s. I love everything about this camera. I have used it for approximately 2 weeks and have found it to be everything that I expected in this price range. If you are looking to move up from your cellphone camera to something that is just below true professional photography this is the camera you will want to review. It is light weight and versatile. Some of the extras in the kit are inexpensive throw-ins. I would have rather seen an extra battery or memory card. However I found the larger tripod easy to use, especially for closeup photography. The price was competitive and the shipping was fast and on time. I would highly recommend this vendor and this product.

Bait and switch????Just received this package. All Components are there BUT the lens kits are not Polaroid as advertised. Instead we got "Xit" brand for the 0.43x lens, 2.2x lens, digital ultraviolet lens and digital reader/writer. Included memory cards were not Lexar brand but Transcend. Included bag was not Canon but Vivitar. Almost every single item was not the brand name advertised. Not sure of the quality of these other items but did find a package online for less money with the Xit products, leading me to believe we didn't receive the quality we paid for.

We bought this set for our granddaughter for Christmas. It appeared to have the accessories she wanted and then some. She is super thrilled and cannot wait to use it for her photography class. We have a budding Pulitzer prize winner thanks to this camera set.

This was the perfect gift for my wife. It's the perfect blend of amazing quality while still being an entry level DSLR camera. The photos are fantastic and we can still take it in the back country without worrying about damaging it. Highly recommend for those who want a nice camera but don't want to break the bank.

The product and kit are awesome with one specific deficiency. The photo clearly leads one to believe they will get two batteries, and even in the product questions section some say they did in fact get two and others only one. So either the picture is wrong or the description and items shipped is.

I'm an amateur photographer that was looking for a reliable, versatile and reasonably priced camera. I saw this deal and I had to jump on it. Ritz Camera sent it quickly and as advertised with their great array of goodies in the bundle.

I was very pleased with the photos the T6 took and how easy it was to learn. The bundle adds so much to this already stellar camera, I especially enjoyed the filters. Definitely a great investment! I cannot wait to see what I can capture next!
